title: Living Room Refresh
desc: Add peace lilies or ferns near windows for natural air purification.

title: Work Desk Vibes
desc: Keep small succulents or snake plants on your desk to boost focus.

title: Balcony Oasis
desc: Hang potted herbs and trailing ivy to create a mini garden escape.
